verses.text: Reprove \w me|strong="H2142"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w*, \nd Lord\nd*, \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H2142"\w* anger, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* chasten \w me|strong="H2142"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H2142"\w* wrath;

\w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* arrows \w have|strong="H3068"\w* sunk into \w me|strong="H3256"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* hand lies heavy \w upon|strong="H2534"\w* \w me|strong="H3256"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* flesh \w is|strong="H3027"\w* no soundness \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* anger, no health \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* bones, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* sin.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H1320"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* guilt \w is|strong="H1320"\w* gone \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w*: \w it|strong="H6440"\w* weighs \w like|strong="H2403"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* burden too heavy \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.
\w My|strong="H3588"\w* wounds stink \w and|strong="H7218"\w* fester, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* foolishness \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am tormented.
Bent \w and|strong="H6440"\w* bowed am \w I|strong="H6440"\w* utterly, \w all|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* day going \w in|strong="H6440"\w* mourning.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* loins \w are|strong="H3117"\w* filled \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w burning|strong="H1980"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* flesh \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* soundness.
\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am utterly crushed \w and|strong="H1320"\w* numb; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* cry louder \w than|strong="H3588"\w* lion roars.

\nd Lord\nd*, \w you|strong="H5704"\w* know \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w*, \w my|strong="H5704"\w* groans \w are|strong="H3820"\w* \w not|strong="H5704"\w* hidden \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* heart \w is|strong="H3605"\w* throbbing, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* strength \w has|strong="H3605"\w* \w failed|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* light \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* eyes â€“ \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w gone|strong="H4480"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w My|strong="H5800"\w* dear \w ones|strong="H1992"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* friends keep aloof, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H5800"\w* neighbors \w stand|strong="H5869"\w* \w afar|strong="H5869"\w* \w off|strong="H5800"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5975"\w* \w who|strong="H7350"\w* aim \w at|strong="H5975"\w* \w my|strong="H5048"\w* life lay \w their|strong="H5975"\w* snares, \w they|strong="H5975"\w* \w who|strong="H7350"\w* seek \w my|strong="H5048"\w* hurt speak \w of|strong="H5061"\w* ruin, nursing treachery all \w the|strong="H5975"\w* day \w long|strong="H7350"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1696"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* turn \w a|strong="H3068"\w* deaf ear \w and|strong="H3117"\w* hear \w not|strong="H1696"\w*; \w like|strong="H1897"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dumb \w I|strong="H3117"\w* open \w not|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* am \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w*, \w with|strong="H6310"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* arguments \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w For|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* hope, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* 
d Lord
d*, \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*. \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* answer, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* 
d Lord
d* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*,

\w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w utter|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hope|strong="H3176"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3068"\w* scorn \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* tottering feet \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* rejoice \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w ready|strong="H4131"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w fall|strong="H4131"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* pain forsakes \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w never|strong="H6435"\w*.
\w I|strong="H3588"\w* acknowledge \w my|strong="H3588"\w* guilt, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am anxious \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H5048"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* sin:
\w My|strong="H5046"\w* wanton assailants \w are|strong="H2403"\w* strong, \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* wrongfully hate \w me|strong="H5046"\w* \w are|strong="H2403"\w* many,
\w who|strong="H2416"\w* render \w me|strong="H8130"\w* evil \w for|strong="H2416"\w* good, \w and|strong="H2416"\w* oppose \w me|strong="H8130"\w*, because I make good \w my|strong="H8267"\w* goal.

\w Do|strong="H7999"\w* \w not|strong="H7451"\w* forsake \w me|strong="H7291"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd*; \w my|strong="H8478"\w* \w God|strong="H7999"\w*, \w be|strong="H7451"\w* \w not|strong="H7451"\w* far \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w me|strong="H7291"\w*.
Hasten \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w help|strong="H5800"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* savior.
